alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 04 at 9:35AM PST until January 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow for higher elevations and strong potentially damaging winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet for elevations above 7500 feet, and 4 to 8 inches for elevations between 6500 and 7500 feet. South winds 25 to 40 mph gusting as high as 60 mph. The winds will arrive before the significant snow does. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially Thursday and Thursday night on Angeles Crest and Big Pines Highways. Strong winds could cause tree damage, downed power lines, and will affect travel on mountain roadways.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.
